c74object.name: dynamic.patch~
c74object.description: dynamic.patch~ is a less fully featured version of dynamic.this~, suitable for use in situations where the patch is busy at the same time as audio processing is on (mute is off). Like dynamic.this~ you can also delete a patch from the inside, without affecting the audio processing of other patches (this also frees the slot into which the patch is loaded).

objarg.name: Initial_state
objarg.description:
An int argument sets the initial busy/mute state of dynamic.patch~.
0 sets the busy flag off / mute flag on
1 sets the busy flag on / mute flag off

method.name: bang
method.description: Sending in a bang will cause dynamic.patch~ to output the patch index when it is inside of a dynamicdsp~ or dynamicserial~.

method.name: int
method.description:
An int input sets the initial busy/mute state of dynamic.patch~.
0 sets the busy flag off / mute flag on
1 sets the busy flag on / mute flag off

method.name: delete
method.description: Sending dynamic.patch~ the delete message will delete that patch that it is in and free up the slot it was using in the dynamicdsp~ or dynamicserial~.

entry.name: int
entry.description: dynamic.patch outputs the patch index (starting from 1) as an int when it recieves a bang. The dynamic.patch should be inside of a dynamicdsp~ or dynamicserial~ or else it will output 0
